hints.content:
We start at $9{:}39$ when Ernesto gets to the museum.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 9:00 to 9:45 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 9:00, 9:15, 9:30, and 9:45 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled tick mark at 9:39. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Ernesto left his house, we go **left** ${27}$ minutes from $9{:}39$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{9{:}39} -{} &\goldE{9}\text{ minutes} = 9{:}30\\\\
{9{:}30} -{} &\purpleD{10}\text{ minutes} = 9{:}20\\\\
9{:}20 -{} & \blueD{8}\text{ minutes} = \greenD{9{:}12} 
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 9:00 to 9:45 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 9:00, 9:15, 9:30, and 9:45 are labeled. A series of three arrows are shown moving right to left from the 9:39 tick mark to the 9:12 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 9:39 tick mark and ends at the 9:30 tick mark and is labeled minus 9. The second arrow starts at the 9:30 tick mark and ends at the 9:20 tick mark and is labeled minus 10. The third arrow starts at the 9:20 tick mark and ends at the 9:12 tick mark and is labeled minus 8. !

hints.content:
Ernesto started walking to the museum at $\greenD{9{:}12} $.  

Which clock shows $\greenD{9{:}12}$?

When Ernesto left his house, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 9 and 10 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 2. !

question.content:
It takes Ernesto $27$ minutes to walk from his house to the science museum. He gets to the museum at $9{:}39 \text { a.m.}$

**What time did the clock show when Ernesto left his house?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 9 and 10 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4f423b376f7202da89863764c3d6ba2ef665116f)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 9 and 10 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/29428b4644dc0b5887e5ce2e569d86867124b361)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 10 and 11 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 3.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0c4f59b6e3a0e4d0997c84d0dc05d2fdc6a13c3f)
